questions.question: Is the title "Parisian Park Etiquette" visible and clearly displayed in the edited image?
questions.explanation: Based on visual cues in Image B, the title 'PARISIAN PARK ETIQUETTE' is visibly prominent and displayed at the top of the image, which combines world knowledge that titles are commonly placed at the top for emphasis and clarity in infographics.

questions.question: Is the infographic layout split vertically, with the pathway acting as a central dividing line?
questions.explanation: Analyzing Image B, the pathway visually divides the image vertically, acting as a central line with stylized elements on each side. In infographics, pathways or clear lines can be used to separate different sections, aiding the audience in distinguishing between them.

questions.question: Are there stylized seating icons present alongside figures who are depicted as sitting in the "Relax" section?
questions.explanation: In Image B, stylized icons representing sitting figures are visible in the 'Relax' section. This aligns with common infographic practice of using clear, recognizable icons to convey actions visually.

questions.question: Are there speech bubble graphics connected by lines to walking figures in the "Engage" section?
questions.explanation: Visual inspection of Image B shows walking figures without direct linking lines to speech bubbles; the figures are simply depicted, potentially engaging, but no explicit speech bubble graphics are connected by lines.

questions.question: Is there a camera icon in the "Capture" section that includes a depiction of the Eiffel Tower within its design?
questions.explanation: Image B presents a camera icon in the 'Capture' section with an outline of the Eiffel Tower within its lens area. This creative representation uses world knowledge that icons are often imbued with relevant graphic elements to convey their theme visually.

questions.question: Are the dominant colors in the infographic cool greens, and are the human figures represented as stylized silhouettes?
questions.explanation: Analyzing Image B, the predominant color scheme consists of varying shades of green, conveying a cool, cohesive visual aesthetic. The human figures are depicted as simple, stylized silhouettes, typical in infographics for clarity and visual focus.

questions.question: Is the text in the infographic presented in clean, elegant typography without cluttered or ornate styling?
questions.explanation: Image B showcases text in straightforward, clean typography that is easy to read, reflecting elegant and uncluttered design principles commonly applied in infographics to ensure the focus remains on the content and message.
